subject: Issue with haptic motors
description_text:
Hello,

I purchased 2 haptic pro motors via aliexpress alongside the plus x pedals.
The pedals are working fine, but none of the motors are working. I tried
both of the motors in all 3 of the possible holes, but none of them
vibrated when pressing the button in the simsonn software. Is there
anything that I can do about this? Or can I get a replacement sent? Is the
issue with the motors or the control box?

Kind regards,
Cas
